name: Blind Sniper
description:
The dead are waking! You, a blind sniper, must fend off the zombies before the escape the graveyard and destroy the world!

How to Play:

You cannot control the sniper. He fires in random directions or towards zombie growls. To fend off the hoard, you have to use abilities to get enemies into his line of fire.

This game was made for the GMTK2020 Jam

All art was made in the jam

Music and sound effects are from the following sources:

https://soundcloud.com/rossbugden/something-wicked

http://soundbible.com/1788-Sniper-Rifle.html

http://soundbible.com/1405-Dry-Fire-Gun.html

https://catastic.itch.io/zombie-sound-pack-free-version
